description: [QuietSieve](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0686) has taken screenshots every five minutes and saved them to the user's local Application Data folder under `Temp\SymbolSourceSymbols\icons` or `Temp\ModeAuto\icons`.(Citation: Microsoft Actinium February 2022)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center. (2022, February 4). ACTINIUM targets Ukrainian organizations. Retrieved February 18, 2022.
